greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of factorial numbers dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10079
program: (PARI) A073575(n) = { my(m=1, i=2, s=0); while(!(n%m), s += m; m *= i; i++); return(s); } \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 19 2018
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 27 2002
